project.description:
Keywords: + Anonymous Inner Classes
AnonymousInnerClassTest1: This class includes a very simple example involving an anonymous inner class that is created in the definition of a field member class which happens to be an interface:
Sequence: This class demonstrates how to implement an iterator-ish interface named Selector to iterate over a sequence of objects. In order to do that, the Sequence includes a method that returns an instance of the Selector interface and the implementations is done there.
The classes include simple runners that can be executed as java program.
